Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Instance
    since 2.0.0, use Accumulo.newClient() and ClientInfo instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ClientConfiguration
    since 2.0.0, replaced by Accumulo.newClient()
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector
    since 2.0.0. Use AccumuloClient for wiriting new code. Connector is available for existing code. Use Connector.from(AccumuloClient) as a bridge between the two.
    org.apache.accumulo.minicluster.MiniAccumuloInstance
    since 2.0.0, Use MiniAccumuloCluster.getClientInfo(File) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ZooKeeperInstance
    since 2.0.0, Use Accumulo.newClient() instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.SecurityOperations.authenticateUser(String, byte[])
    since 1.5.0; use SecurityOperations.authenticateUser(String, AuthenticationToken) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.SecurityOperations.changeUserPassword(String, byte[])
    since 1.5.0; use SecurityOperations.changeLocalUserPassword(String, PasswordToken) or the user management functions of your configured authenticator instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.TableOperations.create(String, boolean)
    since 1.7.0; use TableOperations.create(String, NewTableConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.TableOperations.create(String, boolean, TimeType)
    since 1.7.0; use TableOperations.create(String, NewTableConfiguration) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector.createBatchDeleter(String, Authorizations, int, long, long, int)
    since 1.5.0; Use Connector.createBatchDeleter(String, Authorizations, int, BatchWriterConfig) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector.createBatchWriter(String, long, long, int)
    since 1.5.0; Use Connector.createBatchWriter(String, BatchWriterConfig) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector.createMultiTableBatchWriter(long, long, int)
    since 1.5.0; Use Connector.createMultiTableBatchWriter(BatchWriterConfig) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.SecurityOperations.createUser(String, byte[], Authorizations)
    since 1.5.0; use SecurityOperations.createLocalUser(String, PasswordToken) or the user management functions of your configured authenticator instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.SecurityOperations.dropUser(String)
    since 1.5.0; use SecurityOperations.dropLocalUser(String) or the user management functions of your configured authenticator instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.data.PartialKey.getByDepth(int)
    since 1.7.0
    org.apache.accumulo.minicluster.MiniAccumuloCluster.getClientConfig()
    since 2.0.0, replaced by MiniAccumuloCluster.getClientInfo()
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AbstractInputFormat.getClientConfiguration(JobConf)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by AbstractInputFormat.getClientInfo(JobConf)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AbstractInputFormat.getClientConfiguration(JobContext)
    since 2.0.0; use AbstractInputFormat.getClientInfo(JobContext) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Instance.getConnector(String, byte[])
    since 1.5, use Instance.getConnector(String, AuthenticationToken) with PasswordToken
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Instance.getConnector(String, ByteBuffer)
    since 1.5, use Instance.getConnector(String, AuthenticationToken) with PasswordToken
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Instance.getConnector(String, CharSequence)
    since 1.5, use Instance.getConnector(String, AuthenticationToken) with PasswordToken
    org.apache.accumulo.minicluster.MiniAccumuloCluster.getConnector(String, String)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by MiniAccumuloCluster.getAccumuloClient(String, AuthenticationToken)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Connector.getInstance()
    since 2.0.0, use AccumuloClient.info() instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AbstractInputFormat.getInstance(JobConf)
    since 2.0.0, Use AbstractInputFormat.getClientInfo(JobConf) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AccumuloOutputFormat.getInstance(JobConf)
    since 2.0.0; Use AccumuloOutputFormat.getClientInfo(JobConf) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AbstractInputFormat.getInstance(JobContext)
    since 2.0.0, use AbstractInputFormat.getClientInfo(JobContext) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AccumuloOutputFormat.getInstance(JobContext)
    since 2.0.0; Use AccumuloOutputFormat.getClientInfo(JobContext) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.TableOperations.getSplits(String)
    since 1.5.0; use TableOperations.listSplits(String) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.TableOperations.getSplits(String, int)
    since 1.5.0; use TableOperations.listSplits(String, int) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.IsolatedScanner.getTimeOut()
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Scanner.getTimeOut()
    Since 1.5. See ScannerBase.getTimeout(java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ClientSideIteratorScanner.getTimeOut()
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.TableOperations.importDirectory(String, String, String, boolean)
    since 2.0.0 use TableOperations.importDirectory(String) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.admin.SecurityOperations.listUsers()
    since 1.5.0; use SecurityOperations.listLocalUsers() or the user management functions of your configured authenticator instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AbstractInputFormat.setConnectorInfo(JobConf, String, AuthenticationToken)
    since 2.0.0, use AbstractInputFormat.setClientInfo(JobConf, ClientInfo) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AccumuloOutputFormat.setConnectorInfo(JobConf, String, AuthenticationToken)
    since 2.0.0, use AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientInfo(JobConf, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AbstractInputFormat.setConnectorInfo(JobConf, String, String)
    since 2.0.0, use AbstractInputFormat.setClientPropertiesFile(JobConf, String) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AccumuloOutputFormat.setConnectorInfo(JobConf, String, String)
    since 2.0.0, use AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientPropertiesFile(JobConf, String) instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AbstractInputFormat.setConnectorInfo(Job, String, AuthenticationToken)
    since 2.0.0; use AbstractInputFormat.setClientInfo(Job, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AccumuloOutputFormat.setConnectorInfo(Job, String, AuthenticationToken)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientInfo(Job, ClientInfo)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AbstractInputFormat.setConnectorInfo(Job, String, String)
    since 2.0.0, use AbstractInputFormat.setClientPropertiesFile(Job, String)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AccumuloOutputFormat.setConnectorInfo(Job, String, String)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientPropertiesFile(Job, String)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.IsolatedScanner.setTimeOut(int)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Scanner.setTimeOut(int)
    Since 1.5. See ScannerBase.setTimeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ClientSideIteratorScanner.setTimeOut(int)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AbstractInputFormat.setZooKeeperInstance(Job, ClientConfiguration)
    since 2.0.0; Use AbstractInputFormat.setClientInfo(Job, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce.AccumuloOutputFormat.setZooKeeperInstance(Job, ClientConfiguration)
    since 2.0.0; Use AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientInfo(Job, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AbstractInputFormat.setZooKeeperInstance(JobConf, ClientConfiguration)
    since 2.0.0; Use AbstractInputFormat.setClientInfo(JobConf, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred.AccumuloOutputFormat.setZooKeeperInstance(JobConf, ClientConfiguration)
    since 2.0.0; Use AccumuloOutputFormat.setClientInfo(JobConf, ClientInfo) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.data.Value.toArray(List<byte[]>)
    since 1.7.0; this utility method is not appropriate for the Value object
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.security.tokens.KerberosToken(String, File, boolean)
    since 1.8.0, @see #KerberosToken(String, File)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.MutationsRejectedException(Instance, List<ConstraintViolationSummary>, Map<TabletId, Set<SecurityErrorCode>>, Collection<String>, int, Throwable)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by MutationsRejectedException.MutationsRejectedException(ClientInfo, List, Map, Collection, int, Throwable)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.TableOfflineException(Instance, String)
    since 2.0.0, replaced by TableOfflineException.TableOfflineException(String)
    org.apache.accumulo.core.data.Value(ByteBuffer, boolean)
    A copy of the bytes in the buffer is always made. Use Value.Value(ByteBuffer) instead.
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ZooKeeperInstance(ClientConfiguration)
    since 2.0.0; use Accumulo.newClient() instead
    org.apache.accumulo.core.client.ZooKeeperInstance(String, String)
    since 2.0.0; use Accumulo.newClient() instead
